member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.FirebirdDataProvider
member.summary: Background thread used to load Geo Ip Data from Firebird Database

member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.GeoIpPluginSettings
member.summary: Contains GeoIp settings that are used to connect to MySql, MSSql or Firebird.

member.name: P:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.GeoIpPluginSettings.CacheAllData
member.summary: Determines whether all Geo Ip data is cached in memory or not.

member.name: P:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.GeoIpPluginSettings.DatabaseConnectionString
member.summary: Database connection string, this can also point to a file that contains the connection string.

member.name: P:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.GeoIpPluginSettings.GeoIpProvider
member.summary: Type of provider to be used.

member.name: P:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.GeoIpPluginSettings.CountryList
member.summary: Array of country data that will be loaded in the background whilst the middleware is initialised. This allows for a faster response for specific countries that the website serves. For instance, if your primary customer base is from the USA you could load all Geo Ip address data for that country so it is cached.

member.name: M:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.PluginVersion.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the current internal plugin version supported by SieraDeltaGeoIpPlugin

member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.GeoIpCacheTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing user Geo Ip requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.GeoIpCacheTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by SieraDeltaGeoIpPlugin requests.

member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.GeoIpDatabaseTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing GeoIp requests from a database and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.GeoIpDatabaseTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing GeoIp requests from the database and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.GeoIpMemoryTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing GeoIp requests from memory cache and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.GeoIpMemoryTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing GeoIp requests from memory cache.

member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.GeoIpStatsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns a summary of all preloaded and cached GeoIp records and the load time and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.Classes.GeoIpStatsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns summary data and load time in milliseconds for time spent loading GeoIp data into cache.

member.summary:
IApplicationBuilder extender method.
Allows easy use of registering SieraDeltaGeoIpPlugin

member.name: T:SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the SieraDeltaGeoIp.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
